amendment.description: To provide necessary funding for the Crime-free Rural States by offsetting funds by reducing the account for buildings and facilities of the Federal Prison System.

vote.text: Amendment SA 72 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 72 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S1406-1408; text: CR S1406-1407) To provide necessary funding for the Crime-free Rural States by offsetting funds by reducing the account for buildings and facilities of the Federal Prison System.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 72 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 72 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Leahy.
